name: jam-build
description: An adventurous, scalable, fullstack web application reference project

scripts.build:dev:proxy:sw: npm run build:env:proxy -- SW_INSTRUMENT=1 gulp dev-build
scripts.build:dev:sw: cross-env SW_INSTRUMENT=1 npm run gulp-run -- dev-build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.test:build: npm run test:env -- DEBUG=testcontainers*,server*,api*,test* FORCE_BUILD=1 playwright test --project=dummy
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:env -- DEBUG=server*,api*,test* playwright test --project=Chromium --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:env: cross-env PW_EXPERIMENTAL_SERVICE_WORKER_NETWORK_EVENTS=1 AUTHZ_ADMIN_SECRET=deadbEf-2af536fa DB_DATABASE=jam_build DB_USER=jbuser DB_APP_USER=jbadmin DB_PASSWORD=deadbEef-5dccb117 DB_ROOT_PASSWORD=deadbEef-0b62360e DB_APP_PASSWORD=deadbEef-47148f2f
scripts.test:firefox: npm run test:env -- DEBUG=test* playwright test --project=Firefox
scripts.test:local: npm run build:dev:sw && npm run test:env:local -- playwright test --project=Chromium
scripts.test:local:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=Chromium --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:api:webkit:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=api-webkit --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:api:webkit:proxy:debug: npm run test:env:local:proxy -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=api-webkit --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:api:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=api --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:build: npm run test:env -- DEBUG=testcontainers*,server*,api*,test* FORCE_BUILD=1 playwright test --project=dummy --headed
scripts.test:local:data:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=data-debug --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:pages: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=pages --max-failures=1
scripts.test:local:pages:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --max-failures=1 --project=pages --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:proxy: npm run build:dev:proxy:sw && npm run test:env:local:proxy -- playwright test --project=Chromium
scripts.test:local:webkit:debug: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=test* playwright test --project=Webkit --max-failures=1 --workers=1 --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:webkit:proxy: npm run build:dev:proxy && npm run test:env:local:proxy -- playwright test --project=Webkit
scripts.test:local:webkit:proxy:debug: npm run build:dev:proxy && npm run test:env:local:proxy -- DEBUG=test* playwright test --project=Webkit --timeout=600000 --headed
scripts.test:local:_data: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=localdata
scripts.test:local:_data:app: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=localdata-app
scripts.test:local:_clean: npm run test:env:local -- DEBUG=api*,test* playwright test --project=deletelocaldata --timeout=60000
scripts.test:webkit: npm run test:env -- DEBUG=test* WEBKIT=1 playwright test --project=Webkit

author: Alex Grant <alex@localnerve.com>
